Interface EnhancedClientView

All Known Implementing Classes:
GalaxyTruckerGUI, LobbyView
public interface EnhancedClientView
This interface defines the contract for a user interface component responsible for providing an enhanced view for the client in a game. It includes methods for updating the UI based on game and connection state, as well as managing player-related information.
